1370: Eustacius was born in St. Ians straet in 1370.
1390: Eustacius moved to Davids hof.B.6 after marriage.
Got married to Hilduardis at age 21 in 1390.
1394: Eustacius moved to Koe straet.A.2 after marriage.
Got married a second time to Myrthel at age 25 in 1394.
1381: Lost mother at the age of 11 in childbirth.
1389: Lost sibling Gherbaren in 1389 when Gherbaren was 10.
1391: Had a son with Hilduardis, Lieuin, at age 21.
1392: Had a daughter with Hilduardis, Saswe, at age 22.
1393: Had a son with Hilduardis, Ivone, at age 23.
1395: Lost his wife Myrthel while she was giving birth to Myrthel in 1395.
1398: Lost son Ivone when Ivone was 6 years old.
